Body: job description  positioned at the very heart of the organization  the team will actively involve itself with all services in the company  as the team works to bring existing services to the next level  it is continuously working on new applications  and finding ways of integrating the service propositions  key accountabilities  as one of the founding members of this new team  your role is fundamental to its success  with a proven track record and exceptional it skills  you will be in close contact with our small development teams stationed throughout europe   as you assess their applications and infrastructure  their policies and processes  you continually work to improve and mature their solutions   when your technical skills combine with your ability to communicate and operate in teams  you are effective and instrumental in bringing positive change  as your knowledge of the applications increases  you are able to identify opportunities for integration and increased efficiency  working closely with our business owners  your role is instrumental in guiding and contributing to a continuous stream of new projects   you are a full stack developer  comfortable working in a devops model   requirements   what do i need to bring? operate on a senior level  degree master in information technology or equivalent experience in the area  good command of the english language  you work well in teams  and have good communication skills  your technical expertise covers the following: kubernetes eks aks  containers openshift ecs  azure serverless services aws serverless: lambda stepfuctions  excellent api development skills  application monitoring  backend: python|go|node  | php | ruby |  net core  frontend: javascript | html | css | bootstrap  cicd pipelines technologies  linux os & ansible  what can syone offer me? integration in an organization with profound and sustained growth and involvement in pioneering projects with innovative technological solutions  strong it training plans  professional evolution with intervention in ambitious technological projects  both national and internationally  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços software serviços financeiros tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

a knowledgeworks é uma software house com vários projetos em curso nas mais variadas tecnologias  somos  por isso  capazes de tornar realidade  as visões dos nossos clientes   gostamos de ser desafiados e de sair da nossa zona de conforto   respiramos tecnologia que acreditamos ser um meio para atingir a solução   estás pronto para oferecer a excelência connosco?  procuramos um java fullstack developer na zona de lisboa  o que precisas?  cerca de 4 anos de experiência profissional na área desenvolvimento de restful api’s experiência de trabalho dentro do ecossistema react  o nosso stack é é react  redux  styled components e typescript  gosto por typescript e compreensão de javascript experiência em testes unitários  jest   testing library  experiência com java 8    junit   mocking frameworks bases de dados relacionais: sql e no-sql inglês avançado  obrigatório   local de trabalho: inicialmente remoto  depois em linda a velha  quando procuras fazer carreira e não apenas um trabalho  oferecemos-te:  possibilidade de participar em projetos tecnologicamente inovadores crescimento profissional e progressão de carreira através de formação contínua e atualizada às necessidades do mercado acompanhamento adaptado às tuas necessidades nível de experiência não aplicável setor serviços da informação tecnologia da informação e serviços tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho tecnologia da informação

s  joão da madeira  na bolder tech  a empresa tecnológica do grupo braver  com pólos em s  joão da madeira e lisboa  que desenvolve produtos e serviços próprios nomeadamente para eventos  desporto  turismo  esports e comunicação  queremos integrar na equipa  um a   fullstack developer – eventos  desporto  turismo   m f o   que pesquise  conceba  implemente e gira programas e aplicações  os teste e avalie  identifique e promova melhorias  escreva código eficiente e replicável  aplique procedimentos de controlo da qualidade  utilize eficazmente ferramentas  processos e métricas  mantenha e melhore os sistemas existentes  trabalhe em equipa com outros developers  designers ux e analistas de sistemas   são requisitos essenciais: formação superior em eng  informática ou similar  3 anos de experiência como developer com prática de desenvolvimento de soluções aplicacionais e de front end  web ou não web   domínio de html  css  php  javascript  wordpress e sql  experiência com node   ou typescript  github ou jira e metodologias agyle  fluência em inglês   valorizamos ainda: gosto pelo conhecimento e adopção rápida de novas tecnologias  capacidade analítica  atenção ao detalhe  espírito de equipa  capacidade de comunicação escrita e verbal  atitude calma  flexível e resiliente sob stress  orientação para o cliente   queremos estabelecer uma relação de longo prazo  com excelentes perspetivas de evolução numa organização profissional  cheia de energia ambição  trabalho tendencialmente remoto mas presencial em reuniões de equipa  com clientes e no apoio a eventos   agradecemos resposta com carta de motivação  acompanhada de c v  detalhado   para   guarda-se sigilo  nível de experiência assistente setor marketing e publicidade tecnologia da informação e serviços internet tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

agility  flexibility and competence - are reflected by our work  this is the only way we can effectively contribute to the success of our customers   we’re looking for new team members with the profile of fullstack developer the main responsibilities will be software development with:  react   angular  p & servlets   f  spring mvc javascript  react  redux  storybook  grunt  webpack  oo  distributed and architectural design patterns  sql  nosql  redis  elastic  cloud infrastructure  azure  aws  docker  kubernetes  terraform  required skills and experience:  degree in computer science or similar  development experience  3  years   full-stack experience in c# and javascript  experience with high-scale web applications  distributed systems and apis  experienced in devops and promoter of automation  fluency in english  excellent soft skills  make it happen attitude   we offer:  integration in our young  dynamic and experienced team  with whom you can learn a lot  in an excellent environment and with excellent working conditions  remuneration compatible with experience and demonstrated knowledge  flexible working hours  work from home policy  opportunity to work on fast-growing projects where you will work side by side with decision-makers  training conventions with the team  training and technological certification plan  possibility of usufruct discounts in various partners in the area of fitness  health  beauty  etc  __________________  by submitting my application  i express my consent for the processing of my personal data  by infosistema -  descrição do anúncio  a ankix é uma empresa de competências tecnológicas  a atuar no mercado desde 1999  que presta serviços nas áreas de it outsourcing e consultoria   desenvolvimento à medida  o nosso posicionamento carateriza-se pela qualidade e inovação das soluções que propomos  assim como pela dedicação e orientação para o cliente e suas necessidades   acreditamos que são as pessoas que fazem as empresas  pelo que apostamos continuamente na nossa equipa e na promoção de uma cultura de integração e partilha!  estamos a recrutar para empresa o seguinte perfil  fullstack developer  m f  – lisboa licenciatura em engenharia informática ou similar  experiência profissional mínima de 2 anos na área  conhecimentos em asp net  c# e t-sql  autonomia e sentido de responsabilidade  espírito por trabalho em equipa e capacidade de iniciativa  capacidade de comunicação  bons conhecimentos de inglês  o que podes esperar de nós na nossa empresa  terás bastante acompanhamento semanal e mensal  o teu manager vai estar atento às tuas motivações e sugestões  tens acesso à plataforma online que podes tirar as formações que pretenderes  as vitórias e conquistas serão festejadas em conjunto  acompanhamento da nossa equipa de recursos humanos e suporte  feedback constante do teu trabalho  e como é óbvio bastantes eventos ? vem conhecer-nos e depois tiras as tuas conclusões! Job position: Oferta de emprego: Full Stack Developer para Lagoa, Algarve.
Body: oferta de emprego: full stack developer para lagoa  algarve :cf lda  descrição do emprego  full stack developer para lagoa  algarve  » cf lda  » ref: 7114439  » 24-11-2020  » faro  » informática   programação    detalhe da oferta  a activbookings é um agregador de atividades turísticas  que atualmente conta com uma marketplace de atividades e experiências  um ecossistema de afiliados e um booking engine que foi criado com base nas necessidades dos operadores turísticos que precisavam de gerir e controlar as suas experiências e aceitar reservas online em tempo real   e é efetivamente essa a nossa missão  melhorar constantemente o nosso ecossistema de gestão e vendas dos nossos clientes de animação turística e marítimo turística com mais eficiência e com o objetivo de aumentar as suas reservas e receitas   acreditamos que conseguimos tornar a vida dos nossos clientes mais fácil e lucrativa  nós cuidamos da tecnologia para que os nossos operadores turísticos possam concentrar-se nos seus clientes e no que eles realmente adoram fazer: disfrutar das atividades de animação turística   referência da oferta: atualmente um full stack developer   referência da oferta licenciatura em informática ou similar  ou experiência significativa  paixão pelo conhecimento e pela inovação tecnológica  conhecimento tecnológico conhecimentos de framework django  conhecimentos elevados de python  conhecimentos de bootstrap e ajax  conhecimento e habilidade tecnológica para desenvolver soluções web inovadoras  gosto pelo mercado tecnológico e pela criação e desenvolvimento de produtos inovadores  referência da oferta experiência profissional de pelo menos 1 ano em funções similares  experiência de produção de código em ambiente web  ambição perfil dinâmico e proactivo  gosto pelo desenvolvimento do produto e do projecto  se corresponde aos requisitos apresentados por favor candidate-se através do e-mail: *** candidatura online ***  com a ref: o nosso cliente é uma empresa de desenvolvimento de software que procura reforçar a sua equipa com um full stack developer  m f  para o porto   principais responsabilidades  – desenvolvimento e manutenção da framework da empresa   – otimização dos processos já existentes na framework da empresa   – desenvolvimento e manutenção de aplicações e ou processos  com recurso à  framework da empresa  para os distribuidores e para os seus clientes finais   – apoio aos distribuidores da framework  nas implementações dos seus  clientes finais   requisitos  – formação superior em engenharia informática ou similar  mandatório    – experiência mínima comprovada de 3 anos em projetos de desenvolvimento de  software com recurso a linguagem de programação php e ou actionscrip   – conhecimentos em html  javascript e css assim como frameworks  simples como jquery   – conhecimentos em postgresql ou oracle   – experiência na gestão de servidores linux   – sólidos conhecimentos da língua inglesa   – gosto por trabalhar em equipa   – facilidade de relacionamento interpessoal  e de comunicação falada e escrita  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços recursos humanos varejo tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

Job position: Senior Full Stack Developer - Porto, Portugal
Body: senior full stack developer  microsoft c#  net   azure  asp net mvc  ci cd agile    trillium is a technical innovator delivering digital transformation for membership organisations  using solid design principles  continuous integration  continuous delivery and build automation  as well as jira and confluence tool   as a senior developer you will be responsible for technical development in a team and working closely with a technical analyst   you will be involved on intergations with microsoft dynamics 365 and 3rd party systems such a lms  learning managemnt system   the role will also involve code reviews and architectural overview as you'll be working across the full development lifecycle with a focus on backend development to deliver highly scalable and available systems   requirements you have a strong experience with the microsoft technology stack   net  c#   asp net  mvc api  you are familiar with solid design principles you have worked on highly distributed  real-time systems you are an advocate of agile scrum development you're familiar with unit testing  integration testing  you familiar with continuous integration   continuous delivery   build automation you have excellent communication and interpersonal skills   technical requirements  asp net mvc  model view controller   c#  content management system  umbraco – expert  sitecore – fundamental  rest apis  client-side web development technologies html – expert  css sass – expert  responsive design – expert  javascript – intermediate  jquery – expert  react   – fundamental  bootstrap – advanced  database application  sql – advanced nosql – advanced  microsoft azure  benefits a flexible benefits package you can tailor to suit you professional development accelerated career progression an environment that encourages entrepreneurial spirit  why work for trillium?  we hire mindsets  not just skillsets  we hire people because of how they think  not just what they do  ideas are actively encouraged and embraced from the very first day   we do great things for clients who do great things  our clients are organisations that serve people  not just bottom lines  they include membership bodies  chartered institutes and not-for-profit organisations  which assist their constituents with career development  fund-raising and support for essential causes  we help them enable technology to improve the quality of their services and generally make the world a better place   your passions are our passion  our office is a cultural melting pot  with people from at least a dozen nationalities  who all have amazing stories to share! personal interests are similarly diverse  whatever it is you're into outside of work  there is sure to be someone here who shares a similar interest in learning or participating   please note no agencies  nível de experiência pleno-sênior setor marketing e publicidade tecnologia da informação e serviços software tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho tecnologia da informação

Job position: Fullstack Developer - Jumia ODS ( Full Time)
Body: jumia is the leading pan-africa e-commerce platform  founded in 2012  jumia’s mission is to improve the quality of everyday life in africa by leveraging technology to deliver innovative  convenient and affordable online services to consumers  while helping businesses grow as they use our platform to reach and serve consumers   our platforms consist of our marketplace  which connects sellers with consumers  our logistics service  which enables the shipment and delivery of packages from sellers to consumers  and our payment service  which facilitates transactions among participants active on our platform in selected markets  through our online platforms  consumers can access a wide range of physical and digital goods and services  fashion  electronics  beauty products and also hotel and flight bookings or restaurant delivery   with over 3 000 employees in 14 countries spanning across 6 african regions  jumia is led by top talented leaders offering a great mix of local and international talents and is backed by very high-profile shareholders  jumia is committed to creating sustainable impact for africa  jumia offers unique opportunities in a vibrant and booming environment  creating new jobs  new skills  and empowering a new generation  we are looking for talented people with a passion for africa to join our team and embark on our exciting journey!  your work-life opportunity  the logistics team is responsible for improving time efficiency for our customers  riders  and partner stores  the team leverages machine learning  combinatorial mathematics  and operations research techniques to build services that make smart matching decisions and minimize the staleness of the fleet   in particular  you will work closely with a multidisciplinary team  developers  devops  qa engineers  product owners  oriented to continuous delivery work across the entire product life cycle: concept  design  development  deployment  testing  release  support write module  well-organized code  construct and verify  unit test  software components to meet design specifications take ownership for your code to be qualitatively high and you will support your colleagues in code reviews  integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers build efficient  testable  and reusable modules rapidly fix bugs and solve problems  requirements at least 3 years of previous working experience in web development  previous working knowledge with golang or php  node  and elasticsearch knowledge will be kindly welcomed  understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application user authentication and authorization between multiple systems  servers  and environments creating database schemas that represent and support business processes excellent communication skills and being able to work independently or in a full team proficient with mysql  experienced with web serverside and clientside technologies  working knowledge of symfony framework or similar  experienced with version control technologies  git   aware of performance and security topics on web development preferably previous commercial experience in web application development and   or software development  some knowledge of the linux command line   personal qualities & behavioural traits enthusiasm and an interest in all things technology  solution oriented and proactive attitude  likes problem analysis and solving  eager to work in team environment and share knowhow - easily adapts to new situations and changes  has a keen attention to detail and is organized   academic & trades qualifications higher education in it  software development  experience of the full software development life cycle: from requirements gathering and functional specification  to development  testing and delivery proficiency in english  both written and verbal   we offer a unique experience in an entrepreneurial  yet structured environment the opportunity to become part of a highly professional and dynamic team working around the world an unparalleled personal and professional growth as our longer-term objective is to train the next generation of leaders for our future internet ventures a second home where you will find opportunity for growth and career development  benefit list includes  but is not limited to  health insurance  parental bonus  snacks  fruits and bonuses based on your excellent results  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços internet serviços financeiros tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

what is slate?  slate is a web and mobile product used by some of the top brands in the world to create branded social media content in real-time  we have customers from the nfl  nba  mlb  mls  english premier league as well as some of the largest media organizations and brands in the world   we are a young company made up of a small  dedicated  team distributed across the globe  slate is backed by great investors including titletown tech  a joint venture of the green bay packers & microsoft  and wise ventures  associated with the minnesota vikings    we have been growing rapidly over the past year and have ambitious plans to grow both the company and product offering quickly  we have an exciting and extensive product roadmap of robust features and developments planned for both our web and mobile products  and this is where you fit in!  role description  we're looking for a full-stack developer focused on cloud  aws  and web development  the ideal candidate will be strong on both backend and frontend development   this individual will be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment without a lot of structure  we're particularly interested in an engineer with a passion for collaboration  quick iteration  and improving the skill sets of those they work alongside  the ideal candidate will also have ambitions to help lead an engineering team   for this role  you must be able to work autonomously  you must be proactive  and goal oriented  you will have the ability to balance business values  code quality and development pace   being a part of a small  focused team  you will be working closely with our co-founding team including our cto  based in bulgaria  as well our ceo   head of product  based in nyc  as well as other co-founders  engineers  and designers  this is an ideal role for an experienced engineer who is looking to join a passionate team and be part of the exciting start-up journey   responsibilities actively contribute to a small team of distributed engineers and designers working autonomously and developing features rapidly  design and build new features  simplify existing services  and help scale our systems as we rapidly grow and evolve  write sustainable  testable  high-quality  high-performance code  support and improve existing projects  knowledge of 2d graphics is a big plus  develop the great user experiences designed by our product team  identify opportunities for improvement wear multiple hats and jump between projects & tasks occasionally review peer code changes assist in designing infrastructure and architecture open to share knowledge with teammates and to help assist other teammates as needed    requirements: at least 4  years of back-end development experience with node    at least 2  years on aws services & sdk  at least 4  years of front-end development experience  ideal candidate with have 7  years of programming and development experience typescript 3 5  javascript node   aws: dynamodb  lambda  cognito  cloudformation  other aws services are a plus  design patterns architecture patterns is a plus proficient with angular 8   understanding of angular ecosystem  tools and libraries bootstrap 4  ngrx proficient understanding of html5  css 2  familiarity with commonly used typescript  javascript frameworks and libraries  previous experience helping lead a start-up dev team is a plus excellent communication skills ability to think effectively  critically and creatively fluency in english required   our culture: able to work and communicate positively and respectfully with others you're good at navigating and shaping the dynamics of a rapidly-growing company with a remote-first culture: quickly adapting when priorities change and making conscious trade-offs with incomplete information
